name: The classic 2048 - Puzzle game 🚀
description:
The addictive and a very simple number puzzle game. You join the numbers and get to the max box.

Join the numbers and get to the "20 48" box!

We support classic (4x4) and other sizes 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, 8x8 and time mode!

Be ready for a new challenge with christmas style! And available time table!

Features
- Classic (4x4), (5x5), (6x6), (7x7), (8x8)!
- Speed mode
- Simple and funny puzzle game
- Keep playing for High-score after collected 2048 box
- Game is automatically saved
- One Undo move support
- Beautiful and simple UI
- High score
- Leaderboard

Reach a high score!

How to play
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 box is created in (4x4 mode), the player wins! 8 .. 16 ... 1024 .. 2048.

To access Leaderboard, you will have to sign in using google plus account.
